cells.data: -- intersperse :: Char -> String -> String-- intersperse :: a -> [a] -> [a]on intersperse(sep, xs)	set lng to length of xs	if lng > 1 then		set acc to {item 1 of xs}		repeat with i from 2 to lng			set acc to acc & {sep, item i of xs}		end repeat		if class of xs is string then			concat(acc)		else			acc		end if	else		xs	end ifend intersperse
